title: Exxon to Move Headquarters to Houston
sub_head: The oil giant will remain in Texas but consolidate operations as it reorganizes its business units
body:
Exxon Mobil Corp. is moving its corporate headquarters from Irving, Texas, to Houston as part of a business reorganization that the company said will be completed by 2023.
The reorganization will create three business lines—an oil-and-gas production unit, a chemicals-and-refining unit and a low-carbon unit—and will be effective April 1,  Exxon said Monday. Exxon spokesman Casey Norton said there wouldn’t be any layoffs as part of the reorganization.
